nodes.text: Krel Noviip was a male Shozer. At some point, he was stranded on the gelid planet of Hoth for nearly a week, but managed to stay alive until the Data Seekers of the Anoat sector found him. Following the rescue, Noviip joined his saviors.
During the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, Noviip joined the Smuggler's crew, who dispatched the Shozer on a variety of missions throughout the sector.
Krel Noviip was created for Star Wars: Uprising, a canon mobile game developed by Kabam, Disney Interactive, and Lucasfilm for iOS and Android platforms. The game was released on September 10, 2015.
